name: SAC Designs
tagline: A MOTION, WEB AND PRINT DESIGN AGENCY
description:
We are a Boston-based motion, web and print design agency specializing in explainer videos and website design and development. SAC Designs develops unique designs for marketing agencies, small businesses and large corporations.
MOTION DESIGN AND ANIMATED EXPLAINER VIDEOS
Visual storytelling via motion design (such as animated explainer videos) is our specialty. Our award-winning motion and interactive work have made us the go-to studio for many larger design firms as well as corporations and small businesses. We’re on the cutting edge of technology, from videos to interactive demos to presentations. 
WEBSITE DESIGN AND DEVELOPMENT
Rising trends in mobile and wearable technology make responsive website design and development crucial to your online presence. Not only to allow access via any screen size and resolution, but also to ensure your Search Engine Optimization (SEO) and website rankings. We design and develop a variety of web-based solutions, from custom website design to custom web-based applications and everything in between.
PRINT DESIGN
From vintage posters to infographics to simple brochures, print is still very much in demand. 100% of SAC Design employees love print design–and with over 12 years of experience in award-winning graphic design, we deliver unique solutions that get our clients noticed.
